snippet: Mark Herzlich is replacing Chase Blackburn at middle linebacker, the thinking man’s position on defense.
abstract: New York Giants middle linebacker Mark Herzlich is replacing injured Chase Blackburn, who was signed in 2011 to replace injured Herzlich.
lead_paragraph: Mark Herzlich is replacing Chase Blackburn at middle linebacker, the thinking man’s position on defense.

headline.seo: Giants’ Mark Herzlich Expected to Start for Chase Blackburn
headline.main: With Their Sage Hurt, Giants Have His Fill-In
headline.print_headline: With Their Sage Hurt, Giants Have His Fill-In
